item.title: pymove3D Winner Announcement
item.description:
Summary

The winner of the pymove3D competition is announced. The pymove3D competition ran until May 1st, 2014. The goal was to write a Python program that uses the 3D capabilities of Blender.

Description

Mika Greif, a 13 year old school student gets the first price at the pymove3D contest 2014 by his application Eiszapfenh√∂hle (icicle cave).
item.dc:creator: Mika Greif
